column5: My buddies first time out and 50 inches for him................
WOW! What a great catch, I love the look of Gar. Awesome fish. What lure/technique did you guys score that fish with? I've only ever sight fished them with top water baits.
A true beauty of a gar
Fine catch Love the prehistoric fell of those things.
I sure would like to catch one of those. Awesome looking fish.
Amazing catch, that's definetally on my list of fish to catch this year.  Jacob.
I gotta try to get one of those... I know a few spots that always have gar there... Just never tried...
Cool, I wish I knew a spot where there was gar, would love to try for them. I can't say i have ever even seen one while on the water.

I've seen a couple of people pull them out of the forks of the Thames.  Not sure if they were just randoms or if they're actually resident in that part of the river.  Most people fish for carp or catfish in that area, although I've heard of everything from rainbows to even muskie coming out of there...
I'll be going out sometime to quitnte for gar this year, most of the shallow bays are supposed to have them.
